name: Pixel Town
description:
A miniature town building meets tower defence  game - grow your population, use engineers to close the spawn points,  reach the scenario goals and fight off the mysterious local creatures.

Originally Built For Ludum Dare 38 - Theme - A Small World

Controls

Mouse - Click on buttons to select object to place and then left click to place. Right click to cancel.

Cursor Arrows to Move camera around map. For Zoom in/out use '[' and ']' 

Instructions To Play - in case the tutorial is not clear enough ;) 

Money

Your Population generates money each day through taxes. You need to build houses  to increase the population. These need to be connected by a road to your main town hall, additionally you can build markets and wells to increase the capacity of the nearby houses.

Food

Your population consumes food, you need to build farms on the fertile areas to generate food.

Ore

Build Mines on rocky area near mountains to generate ore

Wood

Build Saw Mills on woody area near trees to generate wood

Archer Towers and Walls

Build these to protect yourself from the creatures that will come and destroy your buildings. Don't forget to upgrade the Archer Towers to increase their range.

Engineers

If you can save enough resources you can build an Engineer base, use this to generate engineers that can be sent to the enemy spawn points and close them.

How To Win

Check the scenario goals for your scenario. Usually need to build a large enough population or close all the spawn points by using engineers.
